observation.reason: The website has a status code 200 indicating that it is up and running. However when accessing the contact us shipping policy return policy terms of service and privacy policy pages they all returned status code 404 indicating that these pages do not exist. This is a common characteristic of scam websites as they often lack important information or have broken links.
